critique: This document is a reinstatement order for Mrs. Marie E. Summers to a position in the Government Printing Office. It is based on the authority vested in the president by the Civil Service Act of 1883. The order is issued upon recommendation of the Public Printer, with the concurrence of the Civil Service Commission. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power expansion, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion aspects in this document. Therefore, the initial scores are all set to 0.
